p: By performing GO and KEGG enrichment analysis on these 708 differentially expressed genes, we found that these 708 differentially expressed genes were enriched in GO terms related to immune cells such as neutrophil activation and neutrophil degranulation ( Figure 2A). At the same time, the hematopoietic cell lineage and Staphylococcus aureus infection were significantly enriched in KEGG pathway analysis ( Figure 2B).
